motd.title: Message of the Day
motd.body:
Release Summary 2.9.0: - Prepared the tool for the steam launch - Prevent issue gathering information related to the launcher and changing the installation directory after the steam release - Removed the Debug Launcher from the menu. If you still need this option, please download 2.8.1 for the time being, or manually start the launcher.
Release Summary 2.8.1: - Fixed an issue where the trace route would cause the ping information to hang indefinitely - Fixed the "Unknown" issue regarding the ping in the UI
Release Summary 2.8.0: - Added the ability to export collected ping results as CSV and will also be added to the ZIP archive - Removed the very first version of this tool, which was written in batch, as it was still roaming around in this repository
